page.title: 10Light Industry-Tamar Valley
page.content: There are not many factories in our area. However at Greenhill there are seven on one site.There is a resin injection factory that also supplies moulds. There are factories producing prefabricated piggeries and body parts for cars. There is a scrap merchant who also supplies coal.A welder relies on local supplies for metals and makes and repairs articles such as gates and trailers,mainly for local farmers. The piggeries are made of ply-wood, glass fibre and asbestos. The total number employed by all of the factories is 30. The products are sold world-wide. At Albaston a firm which used to make ice-cream moved into new premises but after a fire are now supplying from their old premises ice-cream purchased from the large manufacturers. Some new light industrial units are planned.
